$description: Semantic aliases for common design patterns. These provide shorter, more intuitive names for frequently used token combinations.

default.$description: Default surface color for UI containers. Alias for background-passive-neutral-default. Use for cards, panels, and base surfaces.

elevated.$description: Elevated surface color for UI containers above the base layer. Alias for background-passive-neutral-elevated. Use for modals, dropdowns, and floating panels.

interactive.$description: Interactive surface color for clickable elements. Alias for background-active-neutral-default. Use for buttons, links, and interactive areas.

primary.$description: Primary text color for main content. Alias for content-passive-neutral-default. Use for body text, headings, and primary content.

secondary.$description: Secondary text color for less important content. Alias for content-passive-neutral-subtle. Use for captions, secondary text, and less emphasized content.

muted.$description: Muted text color for tertiary content. Alias for content-passive-neutral-muted. Use for placeholder text, hints, and very low-emphasis content.

disabled.$description: Disabled text color for inactive content. Alias for content-active-neutral-disabled. Use for disabled buttons, inactive links, and unavailable content.

default.$description: Default link color for interactive text. Alias for content-active-accent-default. Use for standard links and clickable text.

hover.$description: Hover state color for links. Alias for content-active-accent-hover. Use when user hovers over links.

default.$description: Default border color for UI elements. Alias for border-passive-neutral-default. Use for standard borders, dividers, and outlines.

focus.$description: Focus border color for interactive elements. Alias for border-active-accent-default. Use for focus states on inputs, buttons, and interactive elements.

fast.$description: Fast animation duration (100ms). Use for quick micro-interactions and hover effects.

base.$description: Base animation duration (200ms). Use for standard transitions and interactions.

ease.out.$description: Ease-out easing function. Use for elements entering the viewport.

ease.in.out.$description: Ease-in-out easing function. Use for smooth bidirectional transitions.

background.active.accent.default.$description: Default accent background for primary interactive elements. Use for primary buttons, main CTAs, or key interactive elements.

background.active.accent.subtle.$description: Subtle accent background for secondary interactive elements. Use for secondary buttons or less prominent interactive areas.

background.active.accent.hover.$description: Hover state background for accent interactive elements. Use when user hovers over primary buttons or accent-colored interactive elements.

background.active.accent.selected.$description: Selected state background for accent interactive elements. Use for selected primary options or active accent-colored elements.

background.active.accent.pressed.$description: Pressed state background for accent interactive elements. Use when user clicks primary buttons or accent-colored interactive elements.

background.active.accent.disabled.$description: Disabled state background for accent interactive elements. Use for disabled primary buttons or accent-colored controls.

background.active.accent.inverse.default.$description: Inverse accent background for interactive elements on dark surfaces. Use for primary buttons on dark backgrounds.

background.active.accent.inverse.subtle.$description: Subtle inverse accent background for secondary interactive elements on dark surfaces.

background.active.accent.inverse.hover.$description: Hover state for inverse accent interactive elements on dark surfaces.

background.active.accent.inverse.pressed.$description: Pressed state for inverse accent interactive elements on dark surfaces.

background.active.accent.inverse.disable.$description: Disabled state for inverse accent interactive elements on dark surfaces.

background.active.danger.default.$description: Default danger background for interactive elements. Use for destructive buttons, delete actions, or critical interactive elements.

background.active.danger.subtle.$description: Subtle danger background for secondary destructive actions.

background.active.danger.hover.$description: Hover state background for danger interactive elements. Use when user hovers over destructive buttons or danger-colored interactive elements.

background.active.danger.pressed.$description: Pressed state background for danger interactive elements. Use when user clicks destructive buttons or danger-colored interactive elements.

background.active.neutral.default.$description: Default neutral background for interactive elements. Use for buttons, links, or clickable areas in their default state.

background.active.neutral.hover.$description: Hover state background for interactive neutral elements. Use when user hovers over buttons, links, or clickable areas.

background.active.neutral.pressed.$description: Pressed state background for interactive neutral elements. Use when user clicks or presses buttons or interactive elements.

background.active.neutral.disabled.$description: Disabled state background for interactive neutral elements. Use for buttons or controls that are currently disabled or unavailable.

background.active.success.default.$description: Default success background for interactive elements. Use for success buttons, confirm actions, or positive interactive elements.

background.active.success.hover.$description: Hover state background for success interactive elements.

background.active.success.pressed.$description: Pressed state background for success interactive elements.

background.active.success.disabled.$description: Disabled state background for success interactive elements.

background.active.upgrade.default.$description: Default upgrade background for interactive elements. Use for upgrade buttons, premium CTAs, or special interactive elements.

background.active.upgrade.subtle.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in subtle state.

background.active.upgrade.hover.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in hover state.

background.active.upgrade.pressed.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in pressed state.

background.active.warning.default.$description: Default warning background for interactive elements. Use for warning buttons or caution-requiring interactive elements.

background.active.warning.hover.$description: Hover state background for warning interactive elements.

background.active.warning.pressed.$description: Pressed state background for warning interactive elements.

background.passive.danger.default.$description: Default danger background for passive elements. Use for error states, destructive actions, or critical information that requires attention.

background.passive.danger.subtle.$description: Subtle danger background for passive elements. Use for error message backgrounds or warning areas that need less emphasis.

background.passive.info.default.$description: Default info background for passive elements. Use for informational states, help messages, or neutral information displays.

background.passive.info.subtle.$description: Subtle info background for passive elements. Use for info message backgrounds or informational indicators that need less emphasis.

background.passive.neutral.default.$description: Default neutral background for passive UI elements. Use for cards, containers, and surfaces that don't require user interaction. Provides subtle visual separation without drawing attention.

background.passive.neutral.subtle.$description: Subtle neutral background for passive elements. Lighter than default, use for nested containers or areas that need minimal visual weight.

background.passive.neutral.elevated.$description: Elevated neutral background for passive elements. Use for surfaces that appear above the base layer, such as modals, dropdowns, or floating panels.

background.passive.neutral.strong.$description: Strong neutral background for passive elements. Use for high-contrast backgrounds or emphasis areas that need to stand out.

background.passive.success.default.$description: Default success background for passive elements. Use for success states, confirmation messages, or positive feedback indicators.

background.passive.success.subtle.$description: Subtle success background for passive elements. Use for success message backgrounds or positive indicators that need less emphasis.

background.passive.upgrade.default.$description: Default upgrade background for passive elements. Use for premium features, upgrade prompts, or special content areas.

background.passive.upgrade.subtle.$description: Subtle upgrade background for passive elements. Use for upgrade message backgrounds or premium indicators that need less emphasis.

background.passive.upgrade.strong.$description: Strong upgrade background for passive elements. Use for prominent upgrade calls-to-action or premium feature highlights.

background.passive.warning.default.$description: Default warning background for passive elements. Use for warning states, caution messages, or attention-requiring information.

background.passive.warning.subtle.$description: Subtle warning background for passive elements. Use for warning message backgrounds or caution indicators that need less emphasis.

border.active.neutral.control.field.defa.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent (default). Use for input field borders.

border.active.neutral.control.field.hove.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent (hover). Use for input field borders.

border.active.neutral.control.field.focu.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent (focused). Use for input field borders.

border.active.neutral.control.field.sele.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent (selected). Use for input field borders.

border.active.neutral.control.field.disa.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent (disabled). Use for input field borders.

border.active.neutral.control.toggle.def.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent (default). Use for checkbox and radio button borders.

border.active.neutral.control.toggle.hov.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent (hover). Use for checkbox and radio button borders.

border.active.neutral.control.toggle.dis.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent (disabled). Use for checkbox and radio button borders.

border.active.accent.default.$description: Active border color for accent intent (default). Use for accent-colored interactive elements.

border.active.accent.hover.$description: Active border color for accent intent (hover). Use for accent-colored interactive elements.

border.active.accent.pressed.$description: Active border color for accent intent (pressed). Use for accent-colored interactive elements.

border.active.accent.disabled.$description: Active border color for accent intent (disabled). Use for accent-colored interactive elements.

border.active.accent.selected.$description: Active border color for accent intent (selected). Use for accent-colored interactive elements.

border.active.danger.default.$description: Active border color for danger intent. Use for error states and destructive actions.

border.active.neutral.action.default.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent (default). Use for action buttons and interactive elements.

border.active.neutral.action.hover.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent (hover). Use for action buttons and interactive elements.

border.active.neutral.action.pressed.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent (pressed). Use for action buttons and interactive elements.

border.active.neutral.action.disabled.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent (disabled). Use for action buttons and interactive elements.

border.passive.neutral.default.$description: Passive border color for neutral intent. Use for dividers, separators, and non-interactive borders.

content.active.accent.default.$description: Default accent text color for primary interactive content. Use for primary links or accent-colored interactive text.

content.active.accent.hover.$description: Hover state text color for accent interactive content.

content.active.accent.pressed.$description: Pressed state text color for accent interactive content.

content.active.accent.disabled.$description: Disabled state text color for accent interactive content.

content.active.accent.inverse.default.$description: Active token for accent intent in inverse-default state.

content.active.accent.inverse.hover.$description: Active token for accent intent in inverse-hover state.

content.active.accent.inverse.pressed.$description: Active token for accent intent in inverse-pressed state.

content.active.accent.inverse.disabled.$description: Active token for accent intent in inverse-disabled state.

content.active.danger.default.$description: Default danger text color for destructive interactive content. Use for delete links or danger-colored interactive text.

content.active.danger.hover.$description: Hover state text color for danger interactive content.

content.active.danger.pressed.$description: Pressed state text color for danger interactive content.

content.active.neutral.default.$description: Default neutral text color for interactive content. Use for links, clickable text, or interactive content in default state.

content.active.neutral.hover.$description: Hover state text color for interactive neutral content.

content.active.neutral.pressed.$description: Pressed state text color for interactive neutral content.

content.active.neutral.disabled.$description: Disabled state text color for interactive neutral content.

content.active.upgrade.default.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in default state.

content.active.upgrade.hover.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in hover state.

content.active.upgrade.pressed.$description: Active token for upgrade intent in pressed state.

notes.background.$description: Background color for notes. Use for note containers and highlights.

rating.$description: Color for rating elements. Use for star ratings and score displays.

default.$description: Passive border color for neutral intent. Use for dividers and non-interactive borders.

hover.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent on hover. Use for hover states.

pressed.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent when pressed. Use for pressed states.

disabled.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent when disabled. Use for disabled states.

selected.$description: Active border color for accent intent when selected. Use for selected states.

content.passive.neutral.strong.$description: Strong neutral text color for emphasis. Use for headings, labels, or content that needs high contrast.

content.passive.neutral.default.$description: Default neutral text color for passive content. Use for primary body text, headings, and main content areas.

content.passive.neutral.subtle.$description: Subtle neutral text color for secondary content. Use for secondary text, captions, or less important information.

content.passive.neutral.muted.$description: Muted neutral text color for tertiary content. Use for placeholder text, hints, or very low-emphasis content.

content.passive.on.neutral.strong.$description: Passive token for on intent in neutral-strong state.

content.passive.on.neutral.default.$description: Passive token for on intent in neutral-default state.

content.passive.on.neutral.subtle.$description: Passive token for on intent in neutral-subtle state.

content.passive.on.accent.$description: Passive token for on intent in accent state.

content.passive.on.accent.inverse.$description: Passive token for on intent in accent-inverse state.

content.passive.on.success.$description: Passive token for on intent in success state.

content.passive.on.danger.$description: Passive token for on intent in danger state.

content.passive.on.warning.$description: Passive token for on intent in warning state.

content.passive.on.info.$description: Passive token for on intent in info state.

content.passive.on.upgrade.$description: Passive token for on intent in upgrade state.

xxxs.$description: Extra extra extra small control height (16px). Use for compact inputs and buttons.

xxs.$description: Extra extra small control height (24px). Use for small inputs and buttons.

xs.$description: Extra small control height (32px). Use for compact interactive elements.

sm.$description: Small control height (40px). Use for standard inputs and buttons.

md.$description: Medium control height (48px). Use for comfortable interactive elements.

lg.$description: Large control height (56px). Use for prominent buttons and inputs.

default.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent. Use for input field borders.

hover.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent on hover. Use for hover states.

focused.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent when focused. Use for focus states.

selected.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent when selected. Use for selected states.

disabled.$description: Active border color for neutral control field intent when disabled. Use for disabled states.

default.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent. Use for checkbox and radio button borders.

hover.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent on hover. Use for hover states.

disabled.$description: Active border color for neutral control toggle intent when disabled. Use for disabled states.

xxs.$description: Extra extra small gap (4px). Use for tight spacing between related elements.

xs.$description: Extra small gap (8px). Use for compact spacing in dense layouts.

s.$description: Small gap (12px). Use for standard spacing between related elements.

m.$description: Medium gap (16px). Use for comfortable spacing in standard layouts.

l.$description: Large gap (20px). Use for increased spacing between sections.

xl.$description: Extra large gap (24px). Use for prominent spacing between major sections.

xxl.$description: Extra extra large gap (32px). Use for maximum spacing between distinct sections.

xxs.$description: Extra extra small icon size (16px). Use for inline icons in compact text.

xs.$description: Extra small icon size (20px). Use for icons in small buttons or dense interfaces.

sm.$description: Small icon size (24px). Use for standard icons in buttons and navigation.

md.$description: Medium icon size (32px). Use for prominent icons in cards and headers.

lg.$description: Large icon size (40px). Use for feature icons and large buttons.

xl.$description: Extra large icon size (48px). Use for hero sections and large displays.

xxl.$description: Extra extra large icon size (56px). Use for very prominent displays.

huge.$description: Huge icon size (64px). Use for maximum visual impact in hero sections.

overlay.$description: Overlay opacity (75%). Use for modal backdrops and overlay layers.

xxxs.$description: Extra extra extra small padding (4px). Use for very compact internal spacing.

xxs.$description: Extra extra small padding (8px). Use for compact internal spacing.

xs.$description: Extra small padding (12px). Use for tight internal spacing in dense components.

s.$description: Small padding (16px). Use for standard internal spacing in buttons and inputs.

m.$description: Medium padding (20px). Use for comfortable internal spacing in cards.

l.$description: Large padding (24px). Use for increased internal spacing in larger containers.

xl.$description: Extra large padding (32px). Use for prominent internal spacing in major containers.

xxl.$description: Extra extra large padding (48px). Use for maximum internal spacing in hero sections.

xxxl.$description: Extra extra extra large padding (80px). Use for very large containers.

xxxxl.$description: Extra extra extra extra large padding (120px). Use for maximum spacing in hero sections.

none.$description: No border radius (0px). Use for square corners.

xs.$description: Extra small border radius (4px). Use for compact components like badges or small buttons.

sm.$description: Small border radius (8px). Use for standard buttons and input fields.

md.$description: Medium border radius (12px). Use for cards and larger interactive elements.

lg.$description: Large border radius (16px). Use for prominent cards and containers.

xl.$description: Extra large border radius (20px). Use for large containers and modals.

xxl.$description: Extra extra large border radius (24px). Use for very large containers.

full.$description: Full border radius (999px). Use for pill-shaped elements like tags or rounded buttons.

shadow.xs.$description: Extra small shadow. Use for subtle elevation on small elements.

shadow.sm.$description: Small shadow. Use for light elevation on buttons and inputs.

shadow.md.$description: Medium shadow. Use for standard elevation on cards and dropdowns.

shadow.lg.$description: Large shadow. Use for prominent elevation on modals and popovers.

shadow.xl.$description: Extra large shadow. Use for strong elevation on major overlays.

shadow.2xl.$description: Extra extra large shadow. Use for maximum elevation on top-level modals.

shadow.inner.$description: Inner shadow. Use for inset effects like pressed buttons or input focus.

tooltip.arrow.$description: Size for tooltip arrow indicator. Use for pointing elements in tooltips.

h1.$description: Font size for H1 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h2.$description: Font size for H2 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h3.$description: Font size for H3 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h4.$description: Font size for H4 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h5.$description: Font size for H5 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h6.$description: Font size for H6 headline. Use for page titles and major headings.

h1.$description: Line height for H1 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

h2.$description: Line height for H2 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

h3.$description: Line height for H3 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

h4.$description: Line height for H4 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

h5.$description: Line height for H5 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

h6.$description: Line height for H6 headline. Ensures proper vertical rhythm.

lg.$description: Large body text size. Use for prominent body content and lead paragraphs.

md.$description: Medium body text size. Use for standard body content and paragraphs.

sm.$description: Small body text size. Use for secondary text and captions.

xs.$description: Extra small body text size. Use for fine print and disclaimers.

lg.$description: Line height for body text lg variant. Ensures readable line spacing.

md.$description: Line height for body text md variant. Ensures readable line spacing.

sm.$description: Line height for body text sm variant. Ensures readable line spacing.

xs.$description: Line height for body text xs variant. Ensures readable line spacing.

light.$description: Light font weight. Use for subtle emphasis.

normal.$description: Normal font weight. Use for standard body text.

md.$description: Medium font weight. Use for moderate emphasis.

semibold.$description: Semibold font weight. Use for strong emphasis in body text.

bold.$description: Bold font weight. Use for maximum emphasis.
